[[Ao]] dashes towards his opponent pushing his hands forward and when his hands come in contact with them, he unleashes a spiralling torrent of water.

== Trivia ==
* The {{translation|[[Wikipedia:Azure Dragon|Azure Dragon]]|青龍|Seiryū}} is one of the [[Wikipedia:Four Symbols (Chinese constellation)|Four Symbols]], which is part of Chinese, Japanese and Korean mythology. In this jutsu, the pronunciation of the first kanji is changed.
* This technique is a mixture of both Water Release and taijutsu similar to the [[Gentle Fist]] style of the [[Hyūga clan]], possibly referencing Ao obtaining a [[Byakugan]].
